name: REKOP (johnperes)
description:
Instructions:

- The WEBGL build did a weird thing with my UI, so please, play in fullscreen :)

- Unlike other card games where you have to make pairs or group cards of the same types, in "Rekop" you win if wou have the most different cards

- To win the game you have to win 5 rounds, each round has 3 phases:      Phase 1: you and your opponent draw 5 cards      Phase 2: you can discard up to 5 cards or just pass      Phase 3: both you and your opponent show the hands and you compare the "Hand strenght" to check who win the round

- Hand strenght:      Each player starts the round with 25 points, and each card can change this score, unique cards give +5 points, cards with the same type decrease 2 points, and with same number decrease 3 points      The perfect game consists of 4 unique cards and a joker (50 points)

This game was made for the GJL Game Parade Spring 2021

Controls: Mouse
